title: Face Lotion - 50ml
description: Lotion for your face because dry skin feels worse than missing the last leg on a six leg parlay.
ingredients: Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Lactobacillus, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract
Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum
Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract
Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil

title: Calavera Daily Cleanser
description: Look like a winner, even when the last leg doesn't hit.
ingredients: Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Laurate, Glyceryl Undecylenate
